message:
State Service Configuration in Microsoft #SharePoint Server 2013

Error/Fix: The form cannot be rendered. This may be due to a misconfiguration of the Microsoft SharePoint Server State Service. For more information, contact your server administrator
story: Amr Monjid shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: State Service Configuration in Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013
caption: amrmonjid.wordpress.com
